org.protune.api
Class PrologEngine

java.lang.Object
  org.protune.api.PrologEngine
Direct Known Subclasses:
JLogWrapper, TuPrologWrapper
public abstract class PrologEngine
extends java.lang.Object

As described in the package document, the Protune system consists of an imperative and a declarative part: the first one was implemented (of course) in Java while the second one in Prolog. The declarative part carries out the reasoning tasks related to the negotiation and is implemented by exploiting third-part Java2Prolog and Prolog2Java inference engines. Class PrologEngine provides the interface which these third-part tools should respect in order to conform to the Protune system.

Author:
jldecoi
